fxInfo_citation: Brambor et al. (2016); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: By "covered" we mean whether, based on the title of the yearbook, information about this year was included in a statistical yearbook. For example, if a yearbook was published in 1914, according to its title covering 1911-1914, then v3ststybpub should be coded as 1 for 1914 only, 0 for 1911-1913, but v3ststybcov as 1 for 1911-1914.
fxInfo_question: Was this year covered by a published statistical yearbook?
name: v3ststybcov
